string.name: wp_education_titles_activity_title
string.context: Title for the header of the Education home screen where patients can see education titles assigned to them.

string.name: wp_education_titles_section_header_InProgress
string.context: Title for the (IN PROGRESS) Section's header of the Education home screen where patients can see education titles. Should be uppercase.

string.name: wp_education_titles_section_header_Complete
string.context: Title for the (COMPLETED) Section's header of the Education home screen where patients can see education titles. Should be uppercase.

string.name: wp_education_title_completed
string.context: Indicates that a title was finished.

string.name: wp_education_chapter_section_header_other_topics
string.context: Title for the Other Topics chapter in a book's table of contents. OTHER TOPICS is the chapter name for pages which are associated directly with an education title but with no education topic to act as a chapter.

string.name: wp_education_table_of_contents_title
string.context: Title for the header of the table of contents screen which is like an index for the book, a book being made of an education title with education points as pages and education topics as sections where patients can see education titles assigned to them.

string.name: wp_education_table_of_contents_button
string.context: Button text for a menu bar button that opens the table of contents

string.name: wp_education_web_forward_button
string.context: Button text for a menu bar button that goes forward to a web page

string.name: wp_education_web_back_button
string.context: Button text for a menu bar button that goes back to a previously visited web page

string.name: wp_education_web_launch_external_button
string.context: Button text for a menu button that launches the current web page in an external browser (e.g. Chrome)

string.name: wp_education_web_questions_title
string.context: Title for alert that shows for patient education quesitons.

string.name: wp_education_web_questions_message
string.context: Message for alert that tells user to call their clinic for education questions.

resources.string: Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie om direct met iemand te spreken.

string.name: wp_education_generic_close_button_voiceOver_text
string.context: VoiceOver title for a generic close button indicating that the screen will be closed, used on the table of contents screen's top left to let the user return to a book for example.

string.name: wp_education_book_navigation_previous_page_voiceOver_text
string.context: Voice over text for the previous page button on an Education Book screen that lets patients navigate left or right (or through a slider) between pages (Education Points) in the book

string.name: wp_education_book_navigation_next_page_voiceOver_text
string.context: Voice over text for the next page button on an Education Book screen that lets patients navigate left or right (or through a slider) between pages (Education Points) in the book

string.name: wp_education_title_assigned_date_label
string.context: Appears below an education title's name. The param is the localized date for when the education title was initially assigned to the patient.

string.name: wp_education_book_navigation_current_page_number_label
string.context: Display and Voice over text for the page slider's current position on an Education Book screen that lets patients navigate left or right (or through a slider) between pages (Education Points) in the book

string.name: wp_education_no_education_available
string.context: This text is displayed on the Education home page if the patient has no education to view.

resources.string: U heeft momenteel geen voorlichting om te bekijken.

string.name: wp_education_percentage_understood_voiceOver_text
string.context: Voiceover text for the percentage completion / understood label for an education title in the table of contents. %1$@ would be the percentage, example 50% or 25%

string.name: wp_education_your_response_I_understand_voiceOver_text
string.context: Voiceover text for the status of an education point / page in the table of contents which is marked as I Understand.

string.name: wp_education_your_response_I_have_questions_voiceOver_text
string.context: Voiceover text for the status of an education point / page in the table of contents which is marked as I have questions.

string.name: wp_education_your_response_no_response_voiceOver_text
string.context: Voiceover text for the status of an education point / page in the table of contents to which the user has never responded

string.name: wp_education_tutorial_list_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the education activity to the patient. %%EDUCATION is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: In %%EDUCATION kunt u informatie bekijken over uw aandoening en behandeling. Open uw voorlichting om te beginnen.

string.name: wp_education_tutorial_list_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the education activity to the proxy. %%EDUCATION is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: In %%EDUCATION kunt u informatie bekijken over de aandoening en behandeling van %%PATNAME. Open de voorlichting van %%PATNAME om te beginnen.

string.name: wp_education_tutorial_title_and_point_overview
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the user to navigate through education content and complete the buttons.

resources.string: Blader door de pagina\'s voor meer informatie. Heeft u een pagina met voorlichting voor de huidige ziekenhuisopname gelezen? Geef dan via de knoppen aan of u de informatie heeft begrepen of dat u nog vragen heeft.
